ValidationRule.description: Ensures Role and Project are not Blank if Rate Type = Role-based Override
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(amc__Rate_Type__c, "Role-based Override"), OR( ISBLANK(amc__Project__c), ISBLANK(amc__Role__c), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Skill__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(amc__Rate_Card_Entry__c)) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Project and Role must contain a value, Skill and Rate Card Entry must be empty
